review: This has been a great addition to our television viewing!  We love to watch Prime Instant Access movies for free and purchase others for about the same price as competitors.  My children enjoy playing the games and watching classic movies at no cost to me!The device came preloaded and was a breeze to install.  Movies are easy to access as well. We love this device and glad we purchased it!

review: I have a Chromecast, apple tv, xbox one that I use for streaming purposes. I would rank the Fire TV Stick right up toward the 1st or 2nd. I prefer streaming from the Xbox One but this stick is great. Its nice and fast. Menus are nice.  Remote is nice and responsive. I have no complaints. I would be interested in trying the Fire TV if I happen to catch a deal on one. If the stick is this good the none stick would be amazing with the bump in specs!
